body:
So --- what is your top three best liked Walls maps? ( currently on rotation plz. ) This is just opinion - , fun for you, all of the maps and map makers are great, so this is not about that... This is about - the top three you like. Give reasons if you want to :)
1. Village 2. Garden3. Wild West

title: Best three walls maps in your opinion?

replies.body:
My favorite are
1.Tetris Swamp -Im good at this map easy for me to get stuff
2. Tetris Plain -Same as number1
3. Village -Easy to make forts :)

replies.body:
1. Wild West
2. Tetris Swamp
3. The Village
Honorable Mention: Garden
replies.body_tagged:
1. Wild West
2. Tetris Swamp
3. The Village
Honorable Mention: Garden

replies.body:
1. Oz - love the different levels of mid - potion, bow, head, dia block
2. Garden - love the potions, villager area, and underground garden
3. Wild West - love special items - helm, pants, boots, blazerod, potions

I like the tetris maps too - golden apples, potions, bow, and dia blocks

replies.body:
1. The Village- I can get full diamond.
2. Tetris maps. Like getting tons of diamonds in mid.
3. Wild West- I love the theme.
